variables.feature_title: Mobile-First Responsive Design for Teacher Dashboard
variables.feature_description: Redesign the Teacher Dashboard with a mobile-first approach to support teachers who frequently access the system from tablets and smartphones during classes and while moving between classrooms.
variables.problem_statement: The current Teacher Dashboard is primarily designed for desktop use and provides a poor user experience on mobile devices. Teachers report difficulty accessing student information, taking attendance, and updating grades while using mobile devices in classrooms.
variables.proposed_solution:
Implement a comprehensive mobile-first redesign of the Teacher Dashboard including:

**Mobile-Optimized Interface:**
- Touch-friendly controls with appropriate sizing (44px minimum touch targets)
- Simplified navigation with collapsible menus
- Swipe gestures for common actions
- Progressive disclosure of information

**Responsive Layout System:**
- CSS Grid and Flexbox for flexible layouts
- Breakpoint-based design (mobile, tablet, desktop)
- Adaptive typography and spacing
- Context-aware content prioritization

**Enhanced Mobile Features:**
- Offline capability for critical functions
- Camera integration for quick photo uploads
- Voice-to-text for notes and comments
- Biometric authentication support
- Push notifications for important updates
variables.alternative_solutions:
- Progressive Web App (PWA) implementation
- Native mobile app development
- Tablet-specific optimization only
- Third-party mobile framework integration
variables.technical_requirements:
- **Frontend Framework**: Angular with Angular Material CDK
- **CSS Framework**: Custom responsive design system with Sass
- **Testing**: Responsive design testing across multiple devices
- **Performance**: Mobile performance optimization (lazy loading, code splitting)
- **PWA Features**: Service workers, offline storage, push notifications
- **Cross-browser**: iOS Safari, Android Chrome compatibility
- **Accessibility**: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance for mobile screens
variables.affected_components:
- Teacher Dashboard Angular module
- Shared UI component library
- Authentication and session management
- CSS/Sass styling system
- API response optimization for mobile
- Image and file upload components
variables.criteria_1: Dashboard is fully functional on devices with screen width â‰¥320px
variables.criteria_2: All touch interactions meet 44px minimum target size requirements
variables.criteria_3: Page load time on mobile networks is under 3 seconds
variables.additional_context: This feature request comes from teacher feedback surveys where 78% of teachers indicated they would use mobile access if available. The mobile-first approach will also improve the overall user experience for all device types.
